setting.name: SaveHighCPUResources
setting.friendlyname: Save to RAM (every 5 seconds) CPU usage of resources that are using over 10% to debug when web/ingame PB isn't accessible

setting.name: NotifyIPBUsersOfHighUsage
setting.friendlyname: Requires SaveHighCPUResources to be enabled. Will notify any IPB users if a resources goes over the specified value of CPU %. Default is 50. Set to 1000 to disable.
